At Approximately 3:00pm, Sheriff’s officers responded to a phone call from the driver of a vehicle on the Hardin Elementary Campus. The driver was concerned for the safety of one of her passengers. Law enforcement determined that no medical attention was required and de-activated the emergency status. Accordingly, Hardin Elementary removed the “Shelter in Place” status and continued on with their normal routine. At no time was there a security or safety issue to the students, staff or parents of Hardin Elementary.



Hardin ISD is committed to the safety of all our students and will strive to continue to keep our parents and community informed of any potential safety concerns.
